short_summary: M7 Chiller and Heat Pump Replacement
description:
The National Research Council Canada has a project requirement for chiller and heat pump replacements of Building M07 located on the Montreal Road Campus of the National Research Council of Canada.
The following are the evaluation criteria: Technical rating 40% = Technical Score (Points)
Price rating 60% = Price Score (Points)
Total Score = Max. 100 points
The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS), issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD), Public Works and Government Services Canada.
The contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive worksite(s) must each hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS, granted or approved by CISD/PWGSC.
Security protocol and forms will be shared separately or delivered with Tender proposal.
duration_in_months: Just above or below 12 months or typical commercial project timeframe »,
